title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2, v1.0.0.20065 +10 DLCs
body:
LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2, v1.0.0.20065 +10 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Third-person, 3D
Companies: TT Games / Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI14
Original Size: 22.8 GB
Repack Size: from 7.3 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only] All VO
  • RuTor [magnet] Eng VO Only
  • FreeTorrents Eng VO Only
  • Tapochek.net Eng VO Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Good Old Downloads (NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on LEGO.Marvel.Super.Heroes.2.Infinity.War-CODEX ISO release: codex-lego.marvel.super.heroes.2.infinity.war.iso (24,483,233,792 bytes)
  • Unlike most of my repacks this one is 100% Lossless but NOT MD5 Perfect: game resources were unpacked
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of voice packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 22.8 to 7.3~14.5 GB, depending on selected languages)
  • Installation takes 15-50 minutes (depending on your system and selected languages)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 35 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language (in-game change doesn’t work)
  • ATTENTION! The game uses very long filenames, so to avoid problems, install it to a short path, like C:\Games\LMSH2
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

It’s about TIME! Join your favorite Super Heroes and Super Villains from different eras and realities as they go head-to-head with the time-traveling Kang the Conqueror in the all-new, original adventure, LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2! Play as the Guardians of the Galaxy, Spider-Man, Thor, Hulk, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, Doctor Strange, Green Goblin and dozens of other Marvel Super Heroes and Villains in this cosmic battle across the time-tossed city of Chronopolis! Travel across lands — from Ancient Egypt to The Old West, Sakaar and New York City in 2099 — and transport objects or characters through the centuries! And, with new battle modes, friends and family can play against each other in a series of themed challenges and battle arenas!

Included DLCs:

  • Agents of Atlas
  • Ant-man and the Wasp
  • Black Panther
  • Champions Character Pack
  • Classic Guardians of the Galaxy
  • Cloak and Dagger
  • Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
  • Infinity War
  • Out of Time Character Pack
  • Runaways

You can skip downloading of speech packs you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin (a MUST for English, Russian and other languages without their own voicepack)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German language only – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-07).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with previous repack of this game.
